title: Corny & Funny Christian Pick-up Lines to Delight Your Soul

steps.title: “You put the ‘stud’ in Bible study.”[1] X Research source
steps.content: “You put the ‘stud’ in Bible study.” [1] X Research source

steps.title: “You float my ark.”
steps.content: “You float my ark.”

steps.title: “Is this seat saved? Because I am.”[2] X Research source
steps.content: “Is this seat saved? Because I am.” [2] X Research source

steps.title: “I believe one of my ribs belongs to you.”
steps.content: “I believe one of my ribs belongs to you.”

steps.title: “I’d part the Red Sea for you.”
steps.content: “I’d part the Red Sea for you.”

steps.title: “For you I would slay two Goliaths.”
steps.content: “For you I would slay two Goliaths.”

steps.title: “If we were around with Noah, then we would be a pair!”
steps.content: “If we were around with Noah, then we would be a pair!”

steps.title: “Baby, you’re just like water…except Jesus turned you into fine.”[3] X Research source
steps.content: “Baby, you’re just like water…except Jesus turned you into fine .” [3] X Research source

steps.title: “You must be a Bible verse because I can’t stop memorizing you.”
steps.content: “You must be a Bible verse because I can’t stop memorizing you.”

steps.title: “What’s your name and number so I can add you to my prayer list?”
steps.content: “What’s your name and number so I can add you to my prayer list?”

steps.title: “I’m no Joseph—perhaps you can help me interpret the dreams I’ve been having about you?”
steps.content: “I’m no Joseph—perhaps you can help me interpret the dreams I’ve been having about you?”

steps.title: “Are you related to Abraham’s nephew? Because I like you a Lot.”[4] X Research source
steps.content: “Are you related to Abraham’s nephew? Because I like you a Lot .” [4] X Research source

steps.title: “You make me feel like Samson with his hair cut off: weak at the knees.”[5] X Research source
steps.content: “You make me feel like Samson with his hair cut off: weak at the knees.” [5] X Research source

steps.title: “Now I know why Solomon had 700 wives… Because he never met you.”
steps.content: “Now I know why Solomon had 700 wives… Because he never met you.”

steps.title: “I just want you to know, I’m praying for you…. No, I’m praying for you.”[6] X Research source
steps.content: “I just want you to know, I’m praying for you…. No, I’m praying for you.” [6] X Research source

steps.title: “Is your name Faith? Cause you’re the substance of things I’ve hoped for.”
steps.content: “Is your name Faith? Cause you’re the substance of things I’ve hoped for.”

steps.title: “Unfortunately, I can’t perform miracles and I’ve only got enough bread and fish for 2 people.”
steps.content: “Unfortunately, I can’t perform miracles and I’ve only got enough bread and fish for 2 people.”

steps.title: “The Bible says to bring all our requests to God. I’ve prayed…and here you are.”
steps.content: “The Bible says to bring all our requests to God. I’ve prayed…and here you are.”

steps.title: “You and me, we’re like loaves and fishes. We just might be a miracle together.”
steps.content: “You and me, we’re like loaves and fishes. We just might be a miracle together.”

steps.title: “I’ve got the gift of prophecy and I can see you in my future.”
steps.content: “I’ve got the gift of prophecy and I can see you in my future.”

steps.title: “Did it hurt when you fell from heaven?”
steps.content: “Did it hurt when you fell from heaven?”

steps.title: “Are you an angel? Because I’m allergic to feathers.”
steps.content: “Are you an angel? Because I’m allergic to feathers.”

steps.title: “Is it hot in here or is that just the Holy Spirit burning inside of you?”
steps.content: “Is it hot in here or is that just the Holy Spirit burning inside of you?”

steps.title: “We talk a lot about being spirit-led. Well, the spirit led me straight to you.”
steps.content: “We talk a lot about being spirit-led. Well, the spirit led me straight to you.”

steps.title: “I didn’t know angels flew this low.”[7] X Research source
steps.content: “I didn’t know angels flew this low.” [7] X Research source

steps.title: “Is this the transfiguration? Because you are glowing.”
steps.content: “Is this the transfiguration? Because you are glowing.”

steps.title: “So last night I was reading in the book of Numbers, and I realized… I don’t have yours!”[8] X Research source
steps.content: “So last night I was reading in the book of Numbers, and I realized… I don’t have yours!” [8] X Research source

steps.title: “The Word says ‘Give drink to those who are thirsty, and feed the hungry’… so how about dinner?”
steps.content: “The Word says ‘Give drink to those who are thirsty, and feed the hungry’… so how about dinner?”

steps.title: “Is your name Grace? Because you are amazing!”
steps.content: “Is your name Grace? Because you are amazing!”

steps.title: “I was reading my Bible the other day, and I was wondering if you know what Paul meant by 'greet one another with a holy kiss?'”
steps.content: “I was reading my Bible the other day, and I was wondering if you know what Paul meant by 'greet one another with a holy kiss?'”

steps.title: "It's obvious you sprouted from the good kind of soil."[9] X Research source
steps.content: "It's obvious you sprouted from the good kind of soil." [9] X Research source

steps.title: “Hey girl, the Bible said to think about what is pure and lovely…so I have been thinking about you all day.”
steps.content: “Hey girl, the Bible said to think about what is pure and lovely…so I have been thinking about you all day.”

steps.title: “I didn’t believe in predestination until I met you tonight.”
steps.content: “I didn’t believe in predestination until I met you tonight.”

steps.title: “Me. You. Song of Songs: the remix.”
steps.content: “Me. You. Song of Songs: the remix.”

steps.title: “Would you touch me so I can tell my friends I’ve been touched by an angel?”
steps.content: “Would you touch me so I can tell my friends I’ve been touched by an angel?”

steps.title: “God commands us to be fruitful and multiply. What do you say?"
steps.content: “God commands us to be fruitful and multiply. What do you say?"

steps.title: “Do you need prayer? Because I’m certainly willing to lay hands on you.”
steps.content: “Do you need prayer? Because I’m certainly willing to lay hands on you.”

steps.title: “Let me sell you an indulgence because it’s a sin to look as good as you do.”[10] X Research source
steps.content: “Let me sell you an indulgence because it’s a sin to look as good as you do.” [10] X Research source

steps.title: “Is your daddy a Pastor? ‘Cause that body is preaching to the choir.”
steps.content: “Is your daddy a Pastor? ‘Cause that body is preaching to the choir.”

steps.title: “If kissing you were sin, I would walk happily through hell.”
steps.content: “If kissing you were sin, I would walk happily through hell.”

steps.title: “I can’t wait to see your body of Christ. When are you gonna ask me to church?”
steps.content: “I can’t wait to see your body of Christ. When are you gonna ask me to church?”

steps.title: “I just don’t feel called to celibacy.”
steps.content: “I just don’t feel called to celibacy.”

steps.title: “Want to practice speaking in tongues with me?”
steps.content: “Want to practice speaking in tongues with me?”

steps.title: "Can we change the spelling of 'courtship' to put 'U' and 'I' together?"
steps.content: "Can we change the spelling of 'courtship' to put 'U' and 'I' together?"

steps.title: "Is there a fever spreading in your church? Because you look hot to me."
steps.content: "Is there a fever spreading in your church? Because you look hot to me."
